title: gauss_4dfp
description: Applies a Gaussian filter to 4dfp or conc input files.

input_file.title: 4dfp or conc input file
input_file.description: Input 4dfp or conc file to be processed.

f_half.title: Half frequency
f_half.description: Half frequency in 1/cm for the Gaussian filter application (f_half is the half frequency in 1/cm).

output_root.title: Output root name
output_root.description: Root name for the output file. Default is <inroot>_g<10*f_half>.

endian_flag.title: Output endian
endian_flag.description: Specify output endian; 'b' for big or 'l' for little endian. Default is input endian.
